Preprocess¶

Functions that prepare raw data for simulation

hive.preprocess.calculate_average_driving_speed(reqs_df)[source]¶

Calculates average driving speed for all trips in dataset

hive.preprocess.calculate_road_vmt_scaling_factor(reqs_df)[source]¶

Estimates shortest path distance -> on-road scaling factor for estimating VMT between two points.

hive.preprocess.filter_nulls(reqs_df)[source]¶

Filters requests that contain null values.

hive.preprocess.filter_requests_outside_oper_area(reqs_df, geojson_file)[source]¶

Filters requests in reqs_df whose origin or destination location are outside of the GeoJSON file.

hive.preprocess.filter_short_distance_trips(reqs_df, min_miles=0.05)[source]¶

Filters requests that are less than min_miles (default=0.05). These extremely short distance trips are often measuring errors, i.e. not “actual” trips.

hive.preprocess.filter_short_time_trips(reqs_df, min_time_s=1)[source]¶

Filters requests that are less than min_time_s (default=1). These extremely short time trips are often measuring errors, i.e. not “acual” trips.

hive.preprocess.gen_synth_pax_cnt()[source]¶

Randomly assigns passenger count from real-world distribution measured in 2016(?) in Denver, CO by Henao (NREL).

hive.preprocess.load_requests(reqs_file)[source]¶

Loads, combines, and sorts request csvs by pickup time into a Pandas DataFrame.
